GDevelop er en open-kilde Spil Skaber Program. den kan blive brugt af nogen som helst til at lave hvilken som helst slags 2D Spil.
This website in your language: Dette Hjemmeside er i din sprog
GDevelop was created with love by: GDevelop blev oprettet med kærlighed af
who added features, fixed bugs, sent new: som har tilføjet funktioner, reparer fejl, sendt nye eksempler, skrevet selvstudierne og hjalp samfundet.
BUB is a very special, one of a kind cri: BUB er en meget speciel en, en af en slags critter. Mere specifikt er hun den [mest fantastiske kat på planeten] (http://lilbub.com) ... og hendes spil er lavet med GDevelop!
The game is a retro 8-bit game, with bea: Spillet er en 8-bit spil, med smuk kunst og lyd, som er alternativer mellem platforme niveauer med skjulte hemmeligheder og shooter niveauer med chefer, flere fjender og bonusser.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: Hyperspace Dogfights er en saftig jet-combat roguelike, hvor du vil sprænge, undvige og skære dig vej gennem masser af teknologisk ringere fjender.
As your intergalactic intervention missi: Efterhånden som din intergalaktiske interventionsmission skrider frem, vil din adaptive hyperstråle udvikle sig til noget stærkere og værre ved at samle nogle af de hundredvis af genstande, der er tilgængelige i spillet.
Imagine and publish your games with GDev: Forestil dig og offentliggør dine spil med GDevelop. Bundtet med vejledninger og eksempler.
Contribute to GDevelop - Open-source HTM: Bidrag til GDevelop - Open-source HTML5 spilfremstillingsværktøj
GDevelop is an open-source project (even: GDevelop is an open source project (also this site): everyone can contribute and improve the program!
There are multiple ways you can contribu: Der er mange forskellig måder du kan bidrage til GDevelop, Afhængigt af din tid, færdigheder og hvad du er interesseret i.
GDevelop and the website can be translat: GDevelop og hjemmesiden kan oversættes til dit sprog! Oversættelser er lavet på et websted, hvor alle kan involvere sig.
Help us by translating GDevelop!: Hjælp os ved at translatere GDevelop!
It's easy to get the source code of GDev: det er nemt at få kilden af GDevelop og starte med at forbedre ting!
The forum and the Discord chat are the p: Forumet og Discord chat er stedet at få og give hjælp til andre GDevelop brugere!
Follow GDevelop on Facebook and Twitter:: Følg GDevelop på Facebook og Twitter:
For most beginners and even advanced use: For de fleste begyndere og endda avancerede brugere er vejledninger og hjælpesider de mest værdifulde ressourcer til hurtigt at skabe gode spil. På wiki kan du skrive vejledninger eller forbedre eksisterende.
Download GDevelop or try it online - cre: Hent GDevelop eller prøv det online - lav spil uden programmering
GDevelop is free and can be used for pro: GDevelop er gratis og kan bruges til profit eller non-profit spilfremstilling.
GDevelop runs on Windows, macOS and most: GDevelop kører på Windows, MacOS og nyeste Linux-distributioner. Du kan også prøve det online ved hjælp af Chrome, Firefox eller en anden ny browser.
You need **libgconf-2-4** on your system: Du har brug for ** libgconf-2-4 ** på dit system. Skriv `sudo apt-get install libgconf-2-4` i en terminal eller installer den fra din pakkechef.
To create your first game, start by read: For at oprette dit første spil, start med at læse en tutorial:
GDevelop is an open-source project. You: GDevelop er et åben-kilde projekt. Du kan blive involveret i samfundet for at forbedre det!
Gdevelop 4 can still be downloaded. GDev: Gdevelop 4 kan stadig downloades. GDevelop 5 anbefales til enhver ny bruger, da GDevelop 4 ikke bliver opdateret længere! Der ydes ingen support i fremtiden til GDevelop 4: Vi anbefaler, at en GDevelop 4-bruger opgraderer til GDevelop 5.
Even if GDevelop 4 supports native games: Selvom GDevelop 4 understøtter indfødte spil, anbefaler vi at skifte til GDevelop 5 og HTML5-spil, som bedre understøttes. Indfødte spil vil blive tilføjet til GDevelop 5 senere.
GDevelop for the education - Teach game: GDevelop til uddannelsen - Lær spil skabelse
Using GDevelop in classroom is a perfect: Brug af GDevelop i klasseværelset er en perfekt mulighed for at undervise i programmering, spilfremstilling og frigøre elevernes kreativitet.
GDevelop has already been used in classr: GDevelop er allerede blevet brugt i klasseværelser og online kurser, med digitale mediestudenter eller børn i første klasse!
Please send us your photos and tweets if: Send os dine fotos og tweets, hvis du bruger GDevelop til et kursus!
Make your own Facebook Instant Games wit: Lav dine egne Facebook Instant Spil med GDevelop - udgiv dine spil på Messenger
With GDevelop, you can export your game: Med GDevelop kan du eksportere dit spil som et Facebook Instant Game i 2 klik.
1) Create your app on Facebook Developer: 1) Opret din app på Facebook Developers
First thing, make sure to have an accoun: Første ting skal du sørge for at have en konto på ** Facebook Developers **. Opret en app og konfigurer den for at vælge "Spil" som sin kategori og aktivere Instant Games i Produkter:
2) Open GDevelop and export for Facebook: 2) Åbn GDevelop og eksport til Facebook Instant Games
In GDevelop, open your game and then the: I GDevelop skal du åbne dit spil og derefter eksportvinduet. Vælg ** Facebook Instant Games **, klik på Export og vent et par sekunder.
Go back to your game page on Facebook De: Gå tilbage til din spilside på Facebook Developers, vælg Web Hosting i menuen og ** upload filen **, der blev eksporteret af GDevelop.
You can also add testers to let your fri: Du kan også tilføje testere for at lade dine venner prøve dit spil.
More about uploading your game: Mere om at uploade dit spil
Now, get your phone and **open messenger: Nu få din telefon og ** åben messenger **. Åbn en samtale, vælg Spil og klik på ikonet for dit spil for at begynde at spille på det!
5) Use Instant Games features and publis: 5) Brug Instant Games-funktioner og udgiv dit spil!
GDevelop gave you access to Instant Game: GDevelop gav dig adgang til Instant Games-specifikke funktioner, som navnet på afspilleren, for bedre at integrere dit spil i Messenger-samtaler.
When your game is ready, submit it for r: Når dit spil er klar, send det til gennemgang af Facebook, så det bliver ** tilgængeligt over hele verden **!
Features of GDevelop - create any kind o: Funktioner af GDevelop - lav nogen form for spil uden kodning

Have your objects move and avoiding obst: Få dine objekter til at flytte sig og undgå forhindringer
create platformer games in a breeze: create platformer games in a breeze
quickly make your objects draggable with: hurtigt lave din objekter flytbar med musen
And more, to automate current tasks and: And more, to automate current tasks and behaviors in a few clicks!

The scene editor lets you visually edit: The scene editor lets you visually edit your levels
Add interfaces and create parallax effec: Add interfaces and create parallax effects

a powerful pixel art and sprite editor: a powerful pixel art and sprite editor
Inspect the content of your game and mak: Inspect the content of your game and make dynamic changes while previewing your game

Full support for sound effects and music: Full support for sound effects and musics
Build ambitious games with advanced feat: Build ambitious games with advanced features
Communicate with external websites using: Communicate with external websites using HTTP requests
Use advanced events: loops, for-each and: Use advanced events: loops, for-each and even functions
Manipulate variables with arbitrary comp: Manipulate variables with arbitrary complex structures and even JSON support

All editors of GDevelop - make platforme: All editors of GDevelop - make platformer, shooter, rpg, action games...
The interface of GDevelop is made of int: The interface of GDevelop is made of intuitive editors to design your own games from scratch.
See how to use GDevelop to add a trigger: See how to use GDevelop to add a trigger in your game in 90 seconds
Design your own levels with the scene ed: Design dine egne levels med GDevelop's Scene Editor: du kan vælge objekter, læg dem på scenen, tilpasse deres positioner og størrelse. Du kan designe hele din baner med Scene Editoren. Hvis du vil gerne oprette komplekse levels eller grænseflader, kan de eksterne layout lave dele af en level og genbruge dem i andre scener/levels.
Get started in 2 minutes: Try GDevelop i: Get started in 2 minutes: Try GDevelop in your browser
Imagining and creating the rule of your: Imagining and creating the rule of your game does not imply to learn the syntax of a complex programming language. The events editor displays a sheet of events: each events is composed of conditions and actions. When conditions are fulfilled, actions are run. It's that simple.
All conditions and actions are available: All conditions and actions are available in a list so you can easily discover and find what you want to make the rules of your game.
Learn more about events in the tutorials: Learn more about events in the tutorials

Everything that is displayed on the scre: Alt, hvadd er vises på skærmen på dit spil er et objekt. de fleste objekter kaldes "sprites", de  er sammensat af animationer og kan blive brugt til enhver  animerede element. For eksemel, din spiller, fjender eller bonusser at vælge.
Other object are also available to creat: Andre Objekter er også tilgængelig til at lave grænseflader eller tilføje effekter til dit spil: tekster, partikler, fliser og sprites...
Discover all the objects available in GD: Opdag alle objekter, der er tilgængelige i GDevelop
All the images and audio files used in y: All the images and audio files used in your game are listed in the Resources Editor. It's a simple way to manage your game assets.
GDevelop comes bundled with free assets: GDevelop comes bundled with free assets to get you started! To quickly prototype and create your own assets, GDevelop is also bundled with a powerful pixel art editor called Piskel.
Learn everything about the editors in th: Learn everything about the editors in the documentation
Examples of GDevelop - make platformer,: Examples of GDevelop - make platformer, shooter, rpg, action games...
GDevelop is bundled with 80+ examples an: GDevelop is bundled with 80+ examples and starters to get you quickly started, learn or try a specific feature.
These are the examples bundled with GDev: These are the examples bundled with GDevelop. Curious? You can open and try them directly from your browser. GDevelop is fast to start and you'll be playing with the examples in seconds.

Hyperspace Dogfights, a game created wit: Hyperspace Dogfights, a game created with GDevelop
A juicy jet-combat roguelike game, made: A juicy jet-combat roguelike game, made with GDevelop.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-combat roguelike in which you'll blast, dodge and slice your way through masses of technologically inferior enemies. As your intergalactic intervention mission progresses, your adaptive hyper-jet will evolve into something stronger and weirder by gathering some of the hundreds of items available in the game.
Hyperspace Dogfights began as a side pro: Hyperspace Dogfights began as a side project to our now canceled space exploration roguelike Hyperspace Admirals. HDog was prototyped in late 2016, after which it received a limited early access release on itch.io. Over the course of 2017 the majority of its content was developed and continuous alpha feedback was taken into account. The game was feature-complete in march 2018, after which the release was announced.
Fierce and juicy 2d jet combat against m: Fierce and juicy 2d jet combat against masses of air and ground based enemies
Hundreds of stackable passives, over fif: Hundreds of stackable passives, over fifty weapons and actives; all geared towards producing weird synergies with another
High replayability, your will evolve a l: High replayability, your will evolve a little different on each run
Seven zones with distinct enemy composit: Seven zones with distinct enemy composition to explore
5+ Player hyper-jets to fly, all coming: 5+ Player hyper-jets to fly, all coming with unlockable mk2 loadouts
16 chilled, multi-layered music tracks b: 16 chilled, multi-layered music tracks by Enuit and Ole Toensen
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH, a game created wi: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH, a game created with GDevelop
A retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts: A retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts and soundtrack, made with GDevelop.
Using GDevelop, the game was made availa: Using GDevelop, the game was made available for iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, Linux and even published as a real Arcade game.
The game was announced for BUB's 5th bir: The game was announced for BUB's 5th birthday. To help making it a reality, a Kickstarter was launched so that all BUB's friends around the world can contribute. The kickstarter was initially launched with $100,000 as the goal, but reached $148,000! GOOD JOB BUB.
Huge variety of unique levels, bosses an: Huge variety of unique levels, bosses and enemies
Unique storyline with twists and surpris: Unique storyline with twists and surprises
Item Inventory: collect items to be used: Item Inventory: collect items to be used strategically throughout the game
Tape Deck feature that allows you to sel: Tape Deck feature that allows you to select your favorite music from the game
Ability to revisit and replay levels to: Ability to revisit and replay levels to further your progress and unlock achievements
GDevelop - Create games without programm: GDevelop - Create games without programming - Open source HTML5 and native game creator
GDevelop game maker software - create vi: GDevelop game maker software - create video games without coding
Make your own games with GDevelop: Make your own games with GDevelop
GDevelop is an open-source, cross-platfo: GDevelop is an open-source, cross-platform game creator designed to be used by everyone - no programming skills required.
Unleash your creativity with GDevelop an: Unleash your creativity with GDevelop and create any kind of game: platformers, puzzles, shoot 'em up, strategy, [8-bit games](/make-8bit-pixelart-games)... Go through the examples or start a new project from scratch.
With GDevelop, you can make simple proje: With GDevelop, you can make simple projects for fun or create ambitious indie games like [Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH](/games/lil-bub-hello-earth), [Hyperspace Dogfights](/games/hyperspace-dogfights) and [tons of other games](/games-showcase)!
What makes GDevelop unique and so easy t: What makes GDevelop unique and so easy to use are the events. Events are a powerful way to express the logic of your game, without having to learn a programming language.
Events being used in GDevelop to create: Events being used in GDevelop to create the logic of a game
When Space is pressed, the character ani: When Space is pressed, the character animation and a sound are played. If a bomb touches the character, they both are destroyed.
Export your game in one click: Export your game in one click
Publish your games to the web, iOS, Andr: Publish your games to the web, iOS, Android, Windows, Mac, Linux and even [Facebook Messenger](/facebook-instant-games). Games created with GDevelop run anywhere and you can even do a one-click export to Android from the app.
Make games for iOS, Android, Windows, ma: Make games for iOS, Android, Windows, macOS and Linux
Laptop, tablets or phone: games made wit: Laptop, tablets or phone: games made with GDevelop can run everywhere
Express your ideas without being blocked: Express your ideas without being blocked: you can prototype new features on your games in minutes, and refine them without limits. [Making games](/games-showcase) as never been as easy as assembling your ideas with [the visual editors](/game-editors) provided by GDevelop.
Want to go even further? You can extend: Want to go even further? You can extend the [game engine with Javascript](/javascript-game-engine).
See how to add a trigger button to your: See how to add a trigger button to your platformer game in 90 seconds
[Tons of examples](/game-examples-starte: [Tons of examples](/game-examples-starters) are also available and ready to be tried in one click.
Tutorials for GDevelop and documentation: Tutorials for GDevelop and documentation on the wiki
Using JavaScript to make your games with: Using JavaScript to make your games with GDevelop
GDevelop supports JavaScript to create y: GDevelop supports JavaScript to create your game or extend the game engine.
JavaScript can be used to write part of: JavaScript can be used to write part of a game, alongside with events
Add JavaScript code blocks inside your g: Add JavaScript code blocks inside your game
GDevelop supports adding JavaScript code: GDevelop supports adding JavaScript code blocks at any point in the events of your game. It's a good way to implement a complex algorithm or reuse functions from open-source libraries. Events and code blocks can seamlessly be mixed together - so you can implement parts or even the totality of your game with JavaScript!
The JavaScript editor is based on the su: The JavaScript editor is based on the super powerful Monaco Editor, extracted from [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/). Intellisense autocompletions are provided and the editor supports advanced features like multi-selection for faster coding.
GDevelop is modular and can be extended: GDevelop er modulær og kan udvides til at passe til dine behov. Især er alle tilgængelige funktioner til spil (objekter, adfærd, hændelser) baseret på en udvidelse systemet. Du kan hurtigt oprette nye udvidelser til dit spil eller bidrage til eksisterende, da GDevelop er åben-kilde (https://github.com/4ian/GD).
The Dark theme being used in GDevelop. T: The Dark theme being used in GDevelop. The code editor also comes bundled with several beautiful themes!
Make your own 8-bit and pixelart games: Make your own 8-bit and pixelart games
Sprite editor and tools to make your own: Sprite editor and tools to make your own 8bit games with GDevelop
See Piskel sprite editor being used insi: See Piskel sprite editor being used inside GDevelop to make a 8bit game
GDevelop is bundled with [Piskel](https:: GDevelop har også Piskel(https://www.piskelapp.com/), en meget god 2D Sprite Editor som er nem at bruge, det er den perfekte værktøj til at lave pixel kunst aktiver til at give en retro følelse til din spil! Du kan lave objekter med mange animationer, redigere på spriterne hvornår du vil, og se resultaterne ved at spille dit spil.
Want to create a retro platformer game?: Want to create a retro platformer game? GDevelop has a pre-made behaviors that you can attach to your character and your platforms. In a few seconds you have a basic platformer game running and ready to be customized and enhanced! Other behaviors, conditions and actions can also be used to create any kind of 2D games: shmup, "Bullet Hell", arcade games...
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH: a 8 bit game made: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH: a 8 bit game made with GDevelop
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH is a retro 8-bit g: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH is a retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts and soundtrack, which alternates between platformers levels, with hidden secrets, and shooter levels with bosses, multiple enemies and bonuses.
